name: Visiting a celebrity
description:
A fascinating clicker about a journalist's journey through the homes of the most popular people around the world. In this game you will visit different countries and cities, visiting celebrities. Accumulate gold to buy the necessary resources, collect foreign passports to travel from one country to another.

Imagine yourself as a journalist traveling the homes of the world's most popular people. Get passports to fly from country to country. Earn gold to buy everything you need.

- And much more
  • A well-designed economic system
  • The main currency is " Gold»
  • Large selection of music

  • Some of the most popular people in the world

Gameplay Features:

  • A diverse selection of vehicles
  • Bonus system for in-game currency
  • A soundtrack that emphasizes the style of the game
